# Exploratory Data Analysis

Now it's time to put your new 1337 skillz to the test! You will conduct an exploratory data analysis project (EDA). When doing an EDA you are *only* looking at (exploring) the data and learning about the data and possible relationships between variables. Describe only, no stats!
